version_description: QR codes make life so much easier. Within seconds, you can share links to interesting communities, profiles and content. These codes can be used anywhere. Show them to your friends or print them out for people to scan at events and places around town.

The redesigned VK super app is now available to all!

• Next to your news feed, you’ll find the Discover section, with recommended content and thematic feeds.
• Your profile and Friends are in separate tabs. Everything you need to find people and

The long-awaited Games section is here! You can find it in the second tab of the app. Dive right into your favorite games — you don’t even need to install them.

• Manage your chats
You can now decide whether chat members can invite other people, start group calls, change the chat name or pin messages.

• Mark chats as unread

Check out the new music recommendations! In the “For You” tab, you’ll find two playlists: one offers a new selection of tracks every day, and the other updates once a week. Both of them are created based on your tastes.

We upgraded the voice message speech recognition feature. Now you can read voice message transcriptions and easily copy their text so that you can, for example, respond to a specific part of a message.

Two major updates: we’ve added support for iOS 14 and launched VK Health.

The VK Health platform will help you learn more about your body and start developing good habits. And your friends can help! Ask them for support, compete, share your achieve

The Messages section is now Messenger. This new name more accurately reflects the service’s features, as it’s not only used to send messages but make calls, transfer money and share music, photos, videos and documents as well.
